writer.name: 洛伦佐·维加斯 Lorenzo Vigas

director.name: 洛伦佐·维加斯 Lorenzo Vigas

introduction: A portrait dedicated by Lorenzo to his father Oswaldo: two Vigas', one in front of the camera, the other behind it, to portray the father, one of Venezuela's most famous artists. The renowned Venezuelan artist Oswaldo Vigas, at the age of eighty, travels through the cities of the province in which he grew up, searching for a painting he is convinced was lost when he was a teenager. If he can somehow recover it, he will be able to complete an exhibition he has been preparing since the very beginning of his career. By his side, in his travels, is his wife Jeannine.
